#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
    int n,i,j,m,p,x,y;
        cin>>m>>n>>p;
        int a[m][n];
        int dp[m][n];
        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        while(p--)
        {
            cin>>x>>y;
            a[x-1][y-1]=-1;
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(a[0][i]!=-1)
                dp[0][i]=1;
            else
                break;
        }
        for(j=0;j<m;j++)
        {
            if(a[j][0]!=-1)
                dp[j][0]=1;
            else
                break;
        }
        for(i=1;i<m;i++)
        {
            for(j=1;j<n;j++)
            {
                if(a[i][j]!=-1)
                    dp[i][j]=(dp[i-1][j]%mod+dp[i][j-1]%mod)%mod;
            }
        }
        cout<<dp[m-1][n-1]%mod<<endl;
    return 0;
}
